## Service class

Atomic unit of [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) functionality.

Signature:

```typescript
export declare abstract class Service<Repository = Record<string, any>> extends Bootstrapper<Repository>
```

Extends: [Bootstrapper](/api/bud-framework/bootstrapper)&lt;Repository&gt;

## Remarks

The [Service](/api/bud-framework/service) interface extends [Bootstrapper](//bud-framework/bootstrapper), which provides and [Framework](//bud-framework/framework) access

A [Service](/api/bud-framework/service) is tapped through a series of callbacks at different points in the build.

All of the callbacks are optional:

- [Service.bootstrap()](/api/bud-framework/service/bootstrap) is called when the Service is instantiated (but before all services are guaranteed to be instantiated).

- [Service.bootstrapped()](/api/bud-framework/service/bootstrapped) is called once all Services have been instantiated.

- [Service.register()](/api/bud-framework/service/register) is intended for Services to register functionalities, modules, and bind functions and classes.

- [Service.registered()](/api/bud-framework/service/registered) is called after all [Service/register()](//bud-framework/service/register) callbacks are complete.

- [Service.boot()](/api/bud-framework/service/boot) is called once all services are registered. It should be safe for Services to reference one another.

- [Service.booted()](/api/bud-framework/service/booted) is called after all [Service/boot()](//bud-framework/service/boot) callbacks are complete.

## Properties

| Property                                    | Modifiers | Type                                           | Description                          |
| ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| [ident?](/api/bud-framework/service/ident)  |           | string                                         | <i>(Optional)</i> Service identifier |
| [logger](/api/bud-framework/service/logger) |           | [Logger](//bud-framework/logger)\['instance'\] | Service scoped logger                |

## Methods

| Method                                                        | Modifiers | Description                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| [boot(app)?](/api/bud-framework/service/boot)                 |           | <i>(Optional)</i> Lifecycle method: boot         |
| [booted(app)?](/api/bud-framework/service/booted)             |           | <i>(Optional)</i> Lifecycle method: booted       |
| [bootstrap(app)?](/api/bud-framework/service/bootstrap)       |           | <i>(Optional)</i> Lifecycle method: bootstrap    |
| [bootstrapped(app)?](/api/bud-framework/service/bootstrapped) |           | <i>(Optional)</i> Lifecycle method: bootstrapped |
| [dump(options)](/api/bud-framework/service/dump)              |           | Dump the service repository                      |
| [log(type, messages)](/api/bud-framework/service/log)         |           | Log a message                                    |
| [register(app)?](/api/bud-framework/service/register)         |           | <i>(Optional)</i> Lifecycle method: register     |
| [registered(app)?](/api/bud-framework/service/registered)     |           | <i>(Optional)</i> Lifecycle method: registered   |
